text: We had an amazing coffee brewing session at Compound Coffee Co. The team was incredibly friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. We went there for a friend’s birthday celebration, and they were so meticulous and thoughtful in making the experience special. Not only did we learn a lot about brewing and tasting coffee, but we also had a fantastic time with their super awesome team. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a fun and educational coffee experience!

I learnt a lot about coffees & their origins. Usually more of a tea person but the knowledge is interesting even for someone who doesn’t drink coffee much. Good experience! The people here are nice as well

Pretty nice place for classes with knowledgeable barista. Got a 3oz white for $5, was asked whether I want a single/double shot for my espresso too. The whole place is also full of the bean roasting smell.
they should also call themselves “The Daily Fix” imho. coffee is really good and packs a punch. the baristas are also always friendly and helpful too.
Had a very pleasant workshop experience with Odelia and her team. Thanks for having us and we had so much fun and learned new knowledge about how to appreciate coffee.
